CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 10, 1954, page 21, reads: "NAACP Speaks - Atty. Richard F. Jones, president of the local NAACP addresses the gathering. Mayor David L. Lawrence sits behind Attorney Jones."
TitMainTitle: President of Pittsburgh NAACP branch Atty. Richard F. Jones, standing at podium with WHOD microphone, with women and men seated behind him, including Mal Goode second from left, Daisy Lampkin, and Mayor, David L. Lawrence, gathered for police brutality meeting in Bethel AME Church
